page.title: 19Hang Gliding
page.content: Hang Gliding started in the ninteen fifties, scientists were experimenting with parachutes to bring satellites back to earth from moon shots,they developed a triangular paracute. Someone had the idea of using it to glide.The wing span is about 32 feet and it weighs 75 1bs.The cost of a hang Glider is about 1200 pounds.The altimeter is to tell the pilot how high he is,a variometer tells the pilot whether he is going up or down,the compass is for direction.To fly a hang Glider the weather has got to be favourable.The material is terylene which is yellow and mylon which is white with aluminion poles. David Bricklebank Age10
